fields.description:
{html}

Ticket Reference: http://developer.appcelerator.com/helpdesk/view/68671

User would like minDate and maxDate support added to DatePickerDialog.

{html}
fields.summary: Android Feature Request: DatePickerDialog min/max Date Support

comments.body:
Date Picker min/max working.
Verified on:
Titanium Studio: 2.1.2.201208281351
Titanium SDK: 2.2.0.v20120828153312
Android Device: Samsung Note (v2.3)

minDate and maxDate parameters are NOT working on Android with Ti SDK 3.1.1.GA and tool-api-level 14

Please reopen this ticket.

ps: it won't work if you use the Date Picker together with the showDatePickerDialog() method. It just ignores the min/max dates parameters.
minDate on Android dosen't Work. Ti SDK 3.5.1.GA
